      • parseRawRules

        @Nullable
public List<BuildTarget> parseRawRules(List<Map<String,Object>> rules,
                                       @Nullable
                                       RawRulePredicate filter)
                                throws NoSuchBuildTargetException
        Populates the collection of known build targets that this Parser will use to construct a dependency graph.
        Parameters:
        rules - a list of raw data objects, each of which represents a build rule parsed from a build file
        filter - if specified, applied to each rule in rules. All matching rules will be included in the List returned by this method. If filter is null, then this method returns null.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBuildTargetException
